function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid spread of COVID-19","Impact":"Global pandemic with high mortality rate","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict public health measures, vaccination campaigns, and travel restrictions","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, vaccine development technologies, and air filtration systems","People":"Global population","Owner":"Governments, public health organizations, and international agencies"},{"Description":"Community resistance to vaccination","Impact":"Inadequate immunity and continued spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Public education, building trust in healthcare systems, and addressing misinformation","Technologies":"Social media platforms for public health campaigns and data analytics for targeted interventions","People":"Unvaccinated individuals, communities, and healthcare workers","Owner":"Healthcare providers, government agencies, and community leaders"}]}
